## What's Changed
* Provide an option to opt-out of compile_well_known_types by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3228
* Fixed warnings in various targets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3345
* Enable pipelined_compilation tests for windows by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3347
* Bump crate_universe buildifier version by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3344
* Updated crates index by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3351
* Fix temp value is freed by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3350
* Update MSRV in MODULE.bazel as well as WORKSPACE.bazel by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3353
* Updated unit tests for runfiles by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3352
* Enable more tests on Windows by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3348
* Updated bindgen to `0.71.1` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3358
* Fix rust_bindgen compile flag filtering by @bmclarnon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3363
* Remove forced debug logs from `rust_wasm_bindgen_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3355
* Added Rust 1.85.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3364
* Avoid direct references to volatile files by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3361
* Release 0.59.2 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3362

## New Contributors
* @bmclarnon made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3363

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.59.1...0.59.2

## What's Changed
* Run CI without building runfiles links by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3057
* Add support for ppc64le architecture by @Jenkins-J in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3259
* [path_patching] Shrink size of lockfiles by @jayzhuang in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3334
* Fix broken bindgen doc link by @lalten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3338
* Added `safari` support for `rust_wasm_bindgen_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3328
* Added docs for rust bzlmod extensions. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3336
* Fixed missing cargo_toml_variable_extractor deps by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3337
* Release 0.59.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3332

## New Contributors
* @Jenkins-J made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3259

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.59.0...0.59.1

## What's Changed
* process_wrapper: Convert non-JSON diagnostics from LLVM to JSON. by @martinboehme in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3309
* Fix monitoring input manifest/lockfile/srcs changes by @gferon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3313
* Bump llvm to 17.0.3.bcr.2 for rules_rust_bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3312
* Bump wasm-bindgen dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3174
* Implement priority support for extract_cargo_lints rule by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3316
* Support local path patching in vendor mode by @jayzhuang in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3274
* Fixed loss of data in gen_rust_project for duplicate crate ids by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3317
* Moved all integration tests to `test/integration` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3315
* rust_analyzer: Support passing a --config option to Bazel by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3254
* Added `rust_wasm_bindgen_test` rule by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3267
* Revert "Pin Bazel version to 7.4.1 (#3076)" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3077
* Add firefox linux binaries for `rust_wasm_bindgen_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3320
* cargo_toml_env_vars: rule for generating env vars from a Cargo.toml file by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2772
* Update Crates Index using rev by @taj-p in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3323
* Crate universe compile_data_glob_excludes by @yoks in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3210
* extensions/prost/private/protoc_wrapper: codegen for enums was broken by @zllak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3326
* Populate cargo env vars for crate_universe targets by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3260
* Aded docs for `rust_unpretty` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3327
* Release 0.59.0 by @taj-p in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3321

## New Contributors
* @jayzhuang made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3274
* @taj-p made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3323
* @yoks made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3210
* @zllak made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3326

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.58.0...0.59.0

## What's Changed
* Support new `cargo::` prefixes in build script outputs. by @joell in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3211
* Fix duplicate aliases generated by cargo-bazel when metadata contains… by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3215
* Disable `--incompatible_autoload_externally=` as it's unusable in Bazel8 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3214
* Update mdbook to 0.4.44 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3217
* Migrated nix example to bzlmod. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3208
* Add regression test for build.rs generated features by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3207
* Add missing bzl modules to examples by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3219
* Move buildifier to github actions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3226
* Advertise CrateInfo and DepInfo from the import macro by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3220
* Mark cargo internal extension as reproducible by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3237
* Fixed broken protoc toolchain in examples  by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3221
* Added Rust 1.84.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3225
* Add support for `CARGO_BAZEL_DEBUG=TRACE` level logging by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3238
* Remove unused code from WORKSPACE files in extensions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3222
* Reduce number of default `supported_platform_triples` for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3239
* Set $CARGO in cargo_build_scripts by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3245
* Replace uses of //tools/cpp:toolchain_utils.bzl with @rules_cc//cc:find_cc_toolchain.bzl by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3263
* only set $CARGO if toolchain.cargo is set by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3275
* Ensure crate_universe modules don't override intermediates for debugging by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3244
* Improved release notes by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3248
* Upgrade rules_cc and platforms bzlmod pins by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3265
* Fix + for semver meta by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3277
* Added expected providers to `rust_prost_library`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3276
* Silence noisy cross_rs warnings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3268
* Allow unpretty aspect to run on `rust_shared_library` targets. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3273
* Patch out old deps from transitive prost extension deps by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3264
* Fixed crate_universe when using Rust >= 1.85.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3251
* Add note about private crate registries by @ericmcbride in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3278
* Merge all runfiles of `@bazel_tools//tools/bash/runfiles` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3292
* Allow target names containing `.` for rust_test_suite macro. by @vaibhav-1207 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3298
* map system from "darwin" to "macos" when parsing triple by @christianscott in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3296
* Add 2024 edition to rustfmt tool by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3288
* feat: Create aliases for build dependencies by @bakjos in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3229
* Fix incorrect replacement field in LTO error message by @HackAttack in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3283
* Ran buildifier by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3301
* bindgen: don't `register_toolchains` in Bzlmod by @lalten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3231
* Propagate cc_library defines to clang by @nbdd0121 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3271
* Add prost and tonic deps in rust-project.json if needed for proto by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3270
* Add `build_script_link_deps` to crate annotation system. by @abezukor in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3272
* Reorganized `//tools` package by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3303
* Moved `@rules_rust//tools/runfiles` to `@rules_rust//rust/runfiles` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3294
* Add *.rmeta to rustc_lib rule by @Neo-Zhixing in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3290
* Added Rust 1.85.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3281
* fix: add NIX_LDs vars to work on NixOS by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3304
* Handle debug info packages separately when using `cc_common.link` by @yuzhy8701 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3257
* Use `--remote_download_all` when building `rust_analyzer_crate_spec`s by @martingms in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3192
* Release 0.58.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3302
* Fixed release github workflow. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3305

## What's Changed
* Added documentation for all rules_rust settings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3114
* Add test for editing patch Cargo.toml files by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3063
* Rerun repository rule if manifests changed by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3117
* Remove the unused implicit attribute `_cc_toolchains`. by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3116
* Added `codegen_units` flag for setting `Rustc` resource sets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3112
* Remove crosstool files by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3118
* Added bzlmod support to rust-analyzer tests by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3125
* Look up CARGO_BAZEL_GENERATOR_PATH correctly by @HackAttack in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2088
* Added render_config and splicing_config to create_universe bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3136
* Migrate sys example to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3130
* Updated clippy and rustfmt failure tests to use bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3131
* Cleanup bazel_env example. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3134
* Consolidated docs for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3138
* fix: add 'manual' option for `//rust/settings/lto` by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3120
* Migrate ffi examples to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3129
* Bump min tested Bazel version to 7.4.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3140
* workspace: Pay attention to members by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3102
* Ignore symlinks in workspace discovery by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3142
* Warn less by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3145
* Updated crates_vendor rule to accurately use runfiles by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3146
* Consolidate example packages by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3144
* Remove rules_foreign_cc example by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3151
* Bump llvm-project module to include upstreamed patch by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3149
* Make lto toolchain options public and don't link proc-macros with LTO by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3147
* Update hello_comp_opt example with new LTO settings by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3155
* Replace symlinks in the output of cargo build scripts by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3067
* Updated crate_universe bzlmod to support skipping splicing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3148
* Fixed crate_universe examples not vendoring consistent crate versions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3169
* feat: Add `rust_lint_group` and `cargo_lints` rule to define lint groups by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2993
* Generate docs from source. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3152
* Migrated Android example to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3133
* Added `cargo_manifest_dir` submodule to `cargo_build_script_runner`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3161
* Marked various extensions as reproducible to reduce bzlmod lock size by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3164
* Added missing modules to various workspaces by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3175
* Pin non-bzlmod tests to Bazel 7 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3173
* Run `bazel mod tidy` after vendoring crate_universe outputs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3177
* Add support for UEFI targets and OS by @lorenz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2142
* Add documentation about using binary dependencies in crate_universe by @havasd in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3183
* Improve handling of compile_data with mixed sources by @martingms in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3176
* Updated crate_universe depednencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3182
* Add objective-c and java to clang-format by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3154
* Delete rules_nodejs rules from wasm_bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3153
* Migrated iOS examples to bzlmod by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3132
* Fix toolchain repo aliases and add a test. by @sputt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3181
* Added Rust 1.84.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3179
* Don't register rust_host_tools twice by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3188
* Release 0.57.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3165
* Fix crate_universe release action for MacOS by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3190

## What's Changed
* Added `out_name` attribute to `rust_wasm_bindgen`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3086
* Use rules_shell instead of built-in rules by @jwnimmer-tri in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3096
* Forward clippy, rustfmt, and rust-analyzer through wasm_bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3094
* Added bzlmod support to `test/no_std` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3091
* Use `abs` from utils instead of the global by @avdv in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3075
* Added global setting for `cargo_build_script.use_default_shell_env` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3065
* Remove unnecessary external dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3088
* Added `rust_prost_transform` rule for modifying granular proto_library by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3083
* Ignore .bazel symlinks as well as bazel- symlinks by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3103
* Added `rules_mdbook` to extension modules. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3105
* Support repository_set from bzlmod by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3106
* Updated rules_rust_mdbook docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3108
* Added support for capturing snippets from wasm-bindgen by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3087
* Revert "rust_analyzer: don't build a tree of RustAnalyzerInfos (#3028)" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3093
* feat: Add `//rust/settings:lto` by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3104
* Do not cache rustc info in deps resolver by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3107
* Cut release 0.56.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3109

## New Contributors
* @jwnimmer-tri made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3096
* @avdv made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/3075

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.55.6...0.56.0

* Minor improvements to documentation. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2846
* Updated fetch_shas utility to use the channel manifest tomls by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2840
* Support emitting debug logs in rules_rust process wrapper. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2845
* Prune `known_shas.bzl` to only include versions used in BazelCI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2850
* Avoid double building `cargo_build_script.data` targets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2826
* Use fake.rs not /dev/null as fake source file by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2851
* Moved crate_universe `TreeResolver` into it's own file. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2852
* Error on absolute src paths by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2853
* Improve crate_universe debug logging for `cargo tree` parsing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2854
* Added Rust 1.81.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2841
* Update `runfiles::rlocation!` to return `Option` instead of panicing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2847
* Release 0.50.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2835

## What's Changed
* Remote vendor doesn't require srcs present by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2688
* Add flag to refer to a `sh_toolchain` for process wrapper bootstrap shebangs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2694
* Added Rust 1.79.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2695
* `crate_universe`: Make module extension restarts less expensive. by @criemen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2691
* Add example of using JNI to call into Rust by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2690
* Apply extra_rustc_flags list to all toolchains by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2693
* rust-analyzer: Factor aliases into the project by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2709
* crate_universe docs: Split bzlmod from workspace by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2700
* Updated external dependencies docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2711
* Update wasm-bindgen to 0.2.92 by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2714
* upstream wrappers for cargo, rustc, cargo-clippy by @kolloch in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2703
* Clean up downloads that go through the API instead of the CDN by @ograff in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2718
* Updated rust-analyzer to use repo vs generated files as crate roots by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2717
* crate-universe allows workspaces with MODULE.bazel only by @matt-duch in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2720
* Release 0.47.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2725
* Update bindgen.bzl to use toolchain system include directories as well by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2727
* Use newer macos runners by @ograff in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2732

## What's Changed
* fix: default rustfmt version to supplied rust version by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2660
* Use repo-mapping-aware runfiles API in rust-analyzer by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2666
* Fix protobuf generated srcs to include all sources by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2676
* Fix cargo_build_script executables. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2675
* crate_universe: Don't include crate name in build script path. by @criemen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2663
* Ensure dynamic library dependencies end up in the runfiles directory by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2671
* use bazel_ci_rules bazel_dep instead of http_archive by @mmorel-35 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2678
* Ensure that running `bazel build` on a cargo_build_script target actually runs the build script by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2680
* Allow overriding crate universe packages to local packages by @ograff in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2674
* Depend on a copy of rustfmt for the target by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2685
* [Bugfix] Convert metadata keys to screaming snake case instead of screaming kebab case in `cargo_build_script_runner` by @Pagten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2682
* Add support for override_target when using bzlmod by @AmeliasCode in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2683
* Release 0.46.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2686
